feed.title: Actual AI Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Actual AI: 2.0.5 Fix dryRun
entry.content:
Fix dryRun updating not working for some cases

What's Changed

  • Bump the ai-sdk group with 5 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/224
  • Bump ts-jest from 29.3.1 to 29.3.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/225
  • Bump @types/node from 22.14.0 to 22.14.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/226
  • Bump dotenv from 16.4.7 to 16.5.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/227

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/compare/2.0.4...2.0.5

entry.title: New release for Actual AI: 2.1.0 Feature to disable rate limiting
entry.content:
• Add feature to disable rate limiting
  • Get rid of dryRunNewCategories, use dryRun instead
  • Add more logs for ollama

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/compare/2.0.5...2.1.0
